name: Blossoms & Steel
description:
Blossoms & Steel

This game was made within 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47: Stuck in a loop.

Blossoms and Steel is a short adventure through a beautiful, mysterious and dangerous world. Become a master of the blade, defeat your enemies and escape from a strange entity that won't release its grip on you.

Blossoms and Steel features

  • A short story
  • Local multiplayer duels
  • Detailed pixel art
  • A lot of swordfighting
  • Also a bit of poetry

Have fun playing!
